companyName: Excelsior Law Entertainment Lawyers - Beverly Hills, CA
description:
Our Beverly Hills law firm, Excelsior Law, is a full-service firm dedicated to assisting entertainment professionals. Since our founding, we have focused solely on protecting the rights of those in the entertainment industry who live and work in Los Angeles and surrounding Southern California. We provide general counsel and representation to clients in a wide range of entertainment-related industries, including:

  • Film and television
  • Modeling
  • Music
  • Entertainment startups
  • Fashion
  • Talent agencies and management
  • Print media and publishing

In addition to assisting a variety of clients, we also provide legal services in a broad range of areas, such as:

  • Intellectual property law
  • Entertainment litigation
  • Labor and employment law
  • Models' and actors' rights
  • Branding and celebrity defense
  • Transactional law
  • Talent representation
  • In-house counsel

If you are in the entertainment industry, you can turn to the legal team at Excelsior Law for any legal need. If you are in the midst of a dispute, our seasoned litigators can represent your interests and protect your rights. If you need legal guidance for a transaction or contract, our attorneys can ensure you make the right decisions for your future. Regardless of your need, we invite you to learn more about our law firm by scheduling a free initial consultation at our Beverly Hills law office.
